    Author: Vuram Automation Team

    • SingleSelectDropDown

      public void SingleSelectDropDown(java.lang.String inputtext,
                                 java.lang.String fieldname)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to work with single select dropdown
      Parameters:
      inputtext - Value which needs to be selected in the dropdown
      fieldname - dropdown field name where the user needs to select a value - (For Example:public void SingleSelectDropDown("USA","Country"))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting a value from the dropdown

    • MultiSelectDropDown

      public void MultiSelectDropDown(java.lang.String fieldname,
                                java.lang.String text)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to work with multi select dropdown field
      Parameters:
      fieldname - dropdown field name where the user needs to select a value
      text - Set of values which needs to be selected in the drop down - (For Example: public void MultiSelectDropDown("Industry","Financial,Food")) - Note: In case of multiple values, Please add it with comma separation.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting a value in multi select dropdown

    • SelectValuefromPicker

      public void SelectValuefromPicker(java.lang.String Text,
                                  java.lang.String fieldname)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to select values in both single and multi select picker field
      Parameters:
      Text - Set of values which needs to be selected from the picker field - Note: In case of multiple values, Please add it with comma separation.
      fieldname - Picker field name from which the user needs to pick up the values - (For Example: public void SelectValuefromPicker("India,SouthAfrica","Country"))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting a value from the picker field

    • SingleSelectDropDownforGrid

      public void SingleSelectDropDownforGrid(java.lang.String inputtext,
                                        int gridnumber,
                                        int rownumber,
                                        int columnnumber)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to select a single value in the dropdown field which is present inside the grid
      Parameters:
      inputtext - value which needs to be selected in the dropdown
      gridnumber - The grid number from which the user needs to select a value
      rownumber - The row number from which the user needs to select a value
      columnnumber - The column number from which the user needs to select a value - (For Example: public void SingleSelectDropDownforGrid("India", 1,1,1))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting a dropdown value inside the grid

      public void MultiSelectDropDownforGrid(java.lang.String text,
                                       int gridnumber,
                                       int rownumber,

                                throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to select multiple values in the dropdown field which is present inside the grid
      Parameters:
      text - Set of values which needs to be selected in the drop down
      gridnumber - The grid number from which the user needs to select a value
      rownumber - The row number from which the user needs to select a value
      columnnumber - The column number from which the user needs to select a value - (For Example: public void MultiSelectDropDownforGrid("Financial,Food",1,1,1)) - Note: In case of multiple values, Please add it with comma separation.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting multiple values from the dropdown field inside the grid

                                 int Columnnumber)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to select the check box inside the grid
      Parameters:
      Gridnumber - Grid number in which the check box needs to be selected
      Rownumber - Row number in which the check box needs to be selected
      Columnnumber - Column number in which the check box needs to be selected - (For Example: public void SelectCheckBoxonGrid(1,1,1))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while selecting a check box inside the grid

    • SetWebTextforGrid

      public void SetWebTextforGrid(java.lang.String inputtext,
                              int gridnumber,
                              int rownumber,
                              int columnnumber)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to enter a text in the input text field inside the grid
      Parameters:
      inputtext - Text which needs to be entered in the text box
      gridnumber - Grid number where the user needs to enter the text
      rownumber - Row number where the user needs to enter the text
      columnnumber - Column number where the user needs to enter the text - (For Example: public void SetWebTextforGrid("Test", 1,1,1))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while entering the text into the text box inside the grid

    • SetDateforDateFieldinGrid

      public void SetDateforDateFieldinGrid(java.lang.String inputtext,
                                      int gridnumber,
                                      int rownumber,
                                      int columnnumber)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to enter a date in the date field which is present inside the grid
      Parameters:
      inputtext - Date which needs to be entered in the date field inside the grid
      gridnumber - Grid number where the user needs to enter the date
      rownumber - Row number where the user needs to enter the date
      columnnumber - Column number where the user needs to enter the date - (For Example: public void SetDateforDateFieldinGrid("11/24/2020",1,1,1))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while entering the date in the date field inside the grid

    • MultipleUploadUsingInputValuesinGrid

      public void MultipleUploadUsingInputValuesinGrid(java.lang.String files,
                                                 int Gridnumber,
                                                 int Rownumber,
                                                 int Columnnumber)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to upload the multiple files in document upload field on grid using input values
      Parameters:
      files - Set of files which the user needs to upload
      Gridnumber - Grid number where the user needs to upload
      Rownumber - Row number where the user needs to upload
      Columnnumber - Column number where the user needs to upload - (For Example: public void MultipleUploadUsingInputValuesinGrid("C://Test.docx,C://Test1.docx",1,1,1)) - Note: In case of multiple values, Please add it with comma separation.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while validating the mulitple files upload scenario on grid with input values

    Browser Methods:

    • StartDriver

      public void StartDriver(java.lang.String Browser)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used for initiating the browser to run the automation scripts
      Parameters:
      Browser - Name of the browser from where the user wants to run the test case - (For Example: public void StartDriver("Chrome")) - (Note: By default, Starting a driver will be taken care by the framework so user do not need to use it)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while starting a driver

    • OpenURL

      public void OpenURL(java.lang.String URL)
             throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to open the Application URL
      Parameters:
      URL - The Application URL which needs to be opened - (For Example: public void OpenURL("www.google.com"))
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while opening the URL

    • QuitDriver

      public void QuitDriver()
                throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to quit the browser
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - This exception will be thrown, if an error occurs while quitting the browser - (Note: By default, Quitting a driver will be taken care by the framework so user do not need to use it)
